item.title: Trio of young Roos shine in intra-club hitout
item.description: A trio of young Kangaroos caught the eye at North Melbourne's intra-club match on Wednesday, while the club is still in the dark as to when the League will make a call on Tarryn Thomas

item.title: Fremantle season preview: Does Fyfe's return complete Dockers' midfield puzzle?
item.description: With Nat Fyfe returning to the midfield full-time, the Dockers now have the big body they need to become a more effective clearance and contested ball team

item.title: Veteran Dog rejoins leadership group after nine-year absence
item.description: Tom Liberatore has been appointed vice-captain at the Western Bulldogs for 2024

item.title: The US coach inspiring Adam Simpson's journey of reinvention
item.description: After being backed to launch West Coast's rebuild, Adam Simpson says he's not focused on his own longevity in the job

item.title: Murphy's immediate future uncertain as he opts out of practice games
item.description: Nathan Murphy says he's not ready for competitive matches after suffering a concussion in the Grand Final

item.title: Pies draftee suffers cruel blow, recruit sends scare through camp
item.description: Harry DeMattia will consult a surgeon after a training mishap but will miss between 8-12 weeks

item.title: Tiger to make long-awaited return, injured veterans to be managed
item.description: Josh Gibcus is set to feature in Richmond's match sim this weekend after spending more than a year on the sidelines

item.title: FULL DETAILS: Broadcast, ticket info for every club's pre-season games
item.description: The dates and times for all match simulations and practice matches have been confirmed

item.title: Gun Hawks mid ruled out of round one, return date unclear
item.description: Sam Mitchell confirms reigning club champ's foot injury will sideline him for the Hawks' season opener

item.title: Gold Coast season preview: Dimma's big test, King-sized challenge
item.description: There's a weight of expectation on new Gold Coast coach Damien Hardwick ahead of the 2024 season

item.title: LISTEN: The 'best team of the last five years', Blues' big blow
